thread.title: Travel Memories: Venice

title: Travel Memories: Venice
text:
Pictured are the nine gold columns created by Heinz Mack. They stand 7 meters high and are on the Island of San Giorgio. In the background is St. Mark’s Square (Venice). The picture does not do these incredible structures justice. They were just incredible to see in person. – Don Leigh
If you have a favourite travel memory, please send us a horizontal travel photo and 50 to 75 words about why it is special. Send high-resolution jpegs of between 500K and 6MB to Travel Memories at travel@thestar.ca . Please include your address and phone number.
